info.name: CareSync Final API(8)
info.description: Complete API collection for CareSync healthcare management system

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Updated Medical License",
  "url": "https://example.com/updated-certificate.pdf",
  "details": "Updated board certified medical license",
  "issuingOrganization": "Updated Medical Board",
  "issueDate": "2020-01-15",
  "expiryDate": "2026-01-15",
  "credentialId": "ML123456",
  "credentialUrl": "https://example.com/verify-updated"
}

{
  "patientId": 1,
  "visitDate": "2024-01-15",
  "symptoms": "Fever, headache",
  "diagnosis": "Viral infection",
  "treatment": "Rest and medication",
  "medicine": "Paracetamol",
  "doses": "500mg twice daily",
  "notes": "Follow up in 3 days"
}

item.name: Get Medical History by Date Range

body.raw:
{
  "patientId": 1,
  "visitDate": "2024-01-15",
  "symptoms": "Updated symptoms",
  "diagnosis": "Updated diagnosis",
  "treatment": "Updated treatment",
  "medicine": "Updated medicine",
  "doses": "Updated doses",
  "notes": "Updated notes"
}

request.description: Uploads patient profile image to Cloudinary and updates patient profile with secure URL
Uploads medical documents to Cloudinary and stores metadata with secure URL for patient records
Uploads prescription documents to Cloudinary and associates them with patient records
Uploads lab report documents to Cloudinary and stores them in patient medical records
Uploads insurance documents to Cloudinary and associates them with patient records for billing purposes
Uploads identification documents to Cloudinary for patient verification and record keeping
Uploads doctor certificate to Cloudinary and returns the secure URL along with document metadata

formdata.description: Optional: ID of existing certificate to update URL

request.description: Uploads doctor profile image to Cloudinary and automatically updates doctor's profile with the secure URL

item.name: [DISABLED] Upload Patient Profile Image
item._comment: Duplicate endpoint - disabled to avoid conflicts with patient-specific upload at /api/patients/1/upload/profile-image

item.name: [DISABLED] Upload Medical Document
item._comment: Duplicate endpoint - disabled to avoid conflicts with patient-specific upload at /api/patients/1/upload/medical-document
